original_title: The Little Rascals: The Best of Our Gang Collection (In Color)
overview: Spanky, Buckwheat, Porky and all of the Little Rascals at their hilarious best! All films in this fantastic collection have been fully-restored and are presented here in beautiful COLOR! 1. Fly My Kite, 2. A Lad an' a Lamp, 3. Kid From Borneo, 4. Hi Neighbor, 5. Hide and Shriek
title: The Little Rascals: The Best of Our Gang Collection (In Color)
